I’m obsessed with the quality of these. Super flattering. I have them in four colors now. They are a light and transitional piece going from summer into fall. I’ve dressed them casually with t-shirts or tanks and sneakers and I’ve dressed them up with blouses and even hoodies and boots. I’ve worn them to the Disney parks and out to dinner. I have them in khaki, white, navy and black. The fabric is soft and easy to launder. For reference I am 5”3, 130lbs and I wear a size small. They have a built in short underneath.
